item.title: History of "True Stories" Website
item.description: I was born in 1955, and came to know the Lord Jesus in 1978. You can read the story of my conversion at "When Angels Rejoice". Since then, I have worked as an architect, an editor, and a translator, and now I work as a consultant, writer and speaker. I write business articles and stories for many sites, newspapers and magazines and give lectures on business and marketing. I am also a writer with four books on business and marketing published.
